pullrequest.title: Preparations for apps to be restructured as standard Python packages

content.raw: The need for these changes was made apparent by restructuring `runviewer` in [runviewer PR #37](#!/labscript_suite/runviewer/pull-requests/37). Everything went pretty smoothly! I’ll be attacking the other repos one by one with whatever timing minimises merge conflicts of existing pull requests, and I’ll also test that mercurial is happy to merge things without human intervention so long as both sides did the same rename, if so the merge conflicts will be super simple to fix.
